name: ai-powered-moviematch
description: AI-Powered MovieMatch is a web application that recommends movies tailored to user preferences using **machine learning algorithms**. The project combines collaborative and content-based filtering techniques to provide personalized movie suggestions. Built with **React.js** for the frontend, **Node.js** for the backend, and **PostgreSQL** hosted on Heroku, this project is a showcase of modern web development integrated with machine learning.
author: Siyanda Mayekiso
